alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:24PM CDT until August 25 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES AND SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS CITY... At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sappington, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lakeshire, Affton, Green Park, Wilbur Park, Concord, Mehlville, Lemay, St. George, Arnold, Bella Villa and Oakville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 274 and 277. Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 190 and 191. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; St. Louis; St. Louis City
